title: Crashes Whole Computer
body: So one day the game is running super smooth. The next day, champ select is good, loading screen is good but then once the game starts. My whole computer freezes, and makes a loud ass buzzing sound so im forced to do a hard restart. I uninstalled and reinstalled it, updated my graphics card but still same result. I'm getting mad afk warnings too. lol. Help a brother out

replies.body: This freezing appears to be cause by a recent Windows 10 Update.  There is an issue where the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)is causing the game to freeze for some players.  Disabling that should get you fixed up!
I think you should find a way around it. Not everyone can come to the boards and have you to answer to them.

yea same things happening to my gf. Everytime game starts her computer completely freezes with a buzzing sound in background. Tried reinstalling league, rebooting, etc. Nothing seems to work. msg me if you find a solution, gl~
You need to disable the xbox game bar. Here is how you can do it. http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html
